SELECT ntf.notification_id as notificationId, ntf.chatroom_id as chatroomId, ntf.content, ntf.is_read as isRead, ntf.created_at as createdAt FROM notification as ntf JOIN chatroom as cr ON ntf.chatroom_id = cr.chatroom_id JOIN chatroom_user as cru ON cr.chatroom_id = cru.chatroom_id WHERE cru.user_id = 1 ORDER BY ntf.created_at DESC;
